comment: This mouse is very comfortable and easy to grab because of its perfect size.Its supports AA battery and WIFI is 2.4GHz, so uninterrupted range and connectivity.Its perfect for everyone because it has an inbuilt feature of adjustable CPI so we can change the sensitivity and cursor movement.value for money deal must buy if you are looking for a wireless optical mouse.give it a try.👍

Product is as described. Feels really good to hold. The thumb contours are really well designed and have a soft rubber material. Overall, I'm happy woth the product.What could have been better?1. On/off switch - It's turns on when you press any button and turns off after certain time of inactivity. Probelm is when you keep it in a laptob bag/case, it might turn on due to unintended pressure.2. The back/forward keys could have been customizable for other functions.

Great quality mouse  using this mouse for almost 1 week now before writing this review. It is a really good product and you will love using this mouse. It is very handy and comfortable. Never a glitch and I can use this mouse at very long distance from it's receiver. I believe that is because it connects with receiver through 2.4 GHz wireless tech.If you are looking for something sleek yet functional and which shouldn't hit your wallet a lot, this is the product for you. Go for it

The quality and finishing of the product is amazing.. The design and looks are the best and it gives you a complete feel of a gaming mouse. I have been playing a lot of PC games and this mouse is a masterpiece. The extra buttons are like the additional feature of the product. I am really satisfied and happy after buying the product. Finally I got something which I wanted from a long time. Thanks

This mouse is very comfortable and easy to grab because of its perfect size.Its supports AA battery and WIFI is 2.4GHz, so uninterrupted range and connectivity.Its perfect for everyone because it has an inbuilt feature of adjustable CPI so we can change the sensitivity and cursor movement.value for money deal must buy if you are looking for a wireless optical mouse.give it a try.👍

The product is good, probably one of the best given the price at which I bought it ( 1200/- ). There were delays in the delivery and times when proper tracking was not available. However, once I opened the product all the frustration due to that went up in smoke. It is quiet ergonomic for me (I have small hands). All one needs to do is just pop in the battery and press any key, and you are set. The sensitivity adjustment also works perfectly.One of the qualms I had was it is not possible to do fine adjustment with it. It does not detect very small movements and hence at times gave some trouble.Other than that, it works perfectly.

Probelm is when you keep it in a laptob bag/case, it might turn on due to unintended pressure.2. The back/forward keys could have been customizable for other functions.

I am using this Bluetooth mouse from last one week and I like the following in it:-1)battery life2)touch is very smooth3)Bluetooth connectivity is very fastAnd overall very Good for gaming purposed

The product is good, probably one of the best given the price at which I bought it ( 1200/- ). There were delays in the delivery and times when proper tracking was not available. However, once I opened the product all the frustration due to that went up in smoke. It is quiet ergonomic for me (I have small hands). All one needs to do is just pop in the battery and press any key, and you are set. The sensitivity adjustment also works perfectly.One of the qualms I had was it is not possible to do fine adjustment with it. It does not detect very small movements and hence at times gave some trouble.Other than that, it works perfectly.

Very ergonomic mouse ,Comfortable to use for whole day , connectivity is very fast and easy to setup . Very good compared to others in same category . Very lightweight and dpi control is just awesome. Very easy to switch dpi for gaming . Just get it if you are looking for wireless gaming specifically.
I got a similar product with different name. The function was same as described. It is not a product from USA. It is from China. I regret paying so much. I wrote back to seller. No response

First day itself I ran out of battery life, thought should put better battery and so used a Duracell and exactly after 4hrs of use it's done again. Worse it has 10 days of return and stopped working on 11th day. Such useless piece...

It's a wonderful product with a perfect economic design. Mouse is really fast and it feels perfect to hold in your hand. Just perfect for a gamers bacause it's very responsive and build quality is also awesome. Overall it's a good product. I loved it.
